# Tourists
[color=#999999][italic]"Saaay cheeeese!‚Äù[/italic][/color]
## Special Offer! Now if you're in the mood for adventure, we're having a deal on cameras! Water, Magma, & Blackhole proof, it's just what you need for making your perfect holiday last forever! Powerful but simple to use, just press the button down when near what you want to photo & you're done! It's just that easy!
For 2.68% off, you're practically robbing us!
## Landmarks! You won't have trouble finding things to [italic]shoot[/italic]! The station, a state-of-the-art compound, has no shortage of exploration! From breath-taking machinery to famous staff, immerse yourself in the day to day workings of the crew!
## Gift Shops! The only way to enjoy a vacation more then a once in a lifetime experience is to take home trinkets! You'll find the station rich in treasures; not only excellent mantelpieces, but actually useful back home! Keep an eye out for shopping centers or ask the friendly staff about surplus!
We just know you're going to have the best. Holiday! [bold]EVER![/bold] Just sit back, relax and happy travels, [italic]see you soon[/italic]!
